quest.name: Over the Rails
journal: Acting Guildmaster Thubyrgeim is awaiting the arrival of the inspection party members.

Now that all the members of the Mealvaan's Gate inspection party are assembled and briefed, Foreseer K'lyhia is ready to depart. Meet the assessor and the mercenaries outside of Aleport, and prepare to board the merchant vessel Morningstar.

In order to make your way to the Morningstar, you must first board the small transport craft tied up at the end of the pier. Speak with the landing boat steersman, and announce the arrival of the inspection party.
You have defeated the thugs sent to impede the inspection. Speak with the steersman once more.
You have secured the pier for your companions. Head to the landing boat, and await the arrival of Foreseer K'lyhia and the two mercenaries.

After a mighty battle with the crew of the Morningstar, you manage to arrive before the hatch that leads belowdecks. But just as K'lyhia seeks to begin her inspection, she is suddenly confronted by the ship's dreadful captain. With her grimoire tossed overboard, and her wits scattered by the terrible man standing before her, the foreseer slips into unconsciousness. You have no choice but to abandon the task. Return to the Arcanists' Guild and inform Thubyrgeim of your failure.

You learn from Thubyrgeim that the captain of the Morningstar is an exiled pirate by the name of Doesmaga, and that this is not the first time the foreseer has suffered at his hands. Though K'lyhia has sustained no lasting physical injuries, her mind may require some time to recover from the shock of the encounter. The acting guildmaster bids you channel your emotions into your training, and clear your head for forthcoming duties.

※The next arcanist quest will be available from Thubyrgeim upon reaching level 20.
objectives: Speak with the landing boat steersman.
Report to Thubyrgeim at the Arcanists' Guild.
Defeat the crew of the Morningstar!

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: The mercenaries Geissfryn and Aersthota are here to assist with the inspection.

dialogue.name: THUBYRGEIM
dialogue.text: Both are old hands when it comes to escorting K'lyhia during her more dangerous duties.

dialogue.name: GEISSFRYN
dialogue.text: Well met, Forename. My spells are at your disposal.

dialogue.name: AERSTHOTA
dialogue.text: This won't be the first time we're expectin' trouble, but as long as we follow the foreseer's tactics─and keep a clear head─we'll come through just fine.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: The Morningstar is preparing to dock in Aleport. We will meet our first challenge, however, before we even board the vessel.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: It is almost a certainty that the “merchant ship” has hired a thug or two to accost us at the pier─I calculate the probability at 98%. The crew wish to avoid attacking us on deck, you see, as that would all but trumpet their criminal intentions to the world at large.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: Now, once we do manage to clear the rails, we will face a deck crowded with armed sailors. For a small party such as ours, the most effective strategy will be to incapacitate individual foes as swiftly as possible─each opponent we down is one less weapon raised against us. It is imperative that we do not allow ourselves to become tangled in multiple, drawn-out skirmishes lest we be overwhelmed. I call this “Stratagem Hammerfall.”

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: “Strategy is a tool used to manipulate one's situation into the desired reality.” Keep those words in mind, Forename. It is time we departed─let us regroup before the main gates of Aleport.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: Let us be about our task. Forename, pray inform the steersman at the pier that we are ready to conduct our inspection.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: Should violence be offered, you are to execute Stratagem Hammerfall. Do not forget: your tactics are both your shield and your weapon.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: Please inform the steersman at the pier of our arrival. Any aggression is to be rebuked with Stratagem Hammerfall.

dialogue.name: GEISSFRYN
dialogue.text: The foreseer will be safe with us.

dialogue.name: AERSTHOTA
dialogue.text: We're countin' on you to cut us a path to the landin' boat!

dialogue.name: SENDOU
dialogue.text: You're with the folks from Mealvaan's Gate? I─ Ah, hells, I knew there'd be trouble!

dialogue.name: SENDOU
dialogue.text: Y-You're on your own, lasslad!

dialogue.name: SENDOU
dialogue.text: Well, then! I'm certainly glad to see you can handle yourself. You'll find the landing boat just down here at the end of this ramp. I'll have no part of what comes next, though!

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: Deftly handled, Forename. Once again, I am reminded of our guildmaster.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: Thanks to your efficient response, we will be able to commence this inspection earlier than I had calculated. We shall board the merchant vessel out in the bay.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: Aersthota, if you would take the rudder? The Morningstar awaits.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: Since their welcoming party at the pier failed to deter us, I expect─with a probability of 85%─that our arrival will incite further belligerence.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: Our objective, however, is not to trade blows, but to gain access to the hold. It may behoove us to employ “Stratagem Hardhead.”

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: The aim of our opponents is to buy time so that suspect goods may be tossed into the ocean. I do not intend to give them that time. We will bull our way towards the cargo hold as quickly as we can.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: It is a tactic fraught with risk, but one that your presence makes possible. Shall we begin?

dialogue.name: TALK
dialogue.text: I am Foreseer K'lyhia. By the authority of Mealvaan's Gate, I request that you surrender your goods for assessment!

dialogue.name: TALK
dialogue.text: Well, now, yer timin' couldn't be worse, lass. The 'old door's all rusted up, ye see. Bloody thing won't open. Ye'll 'ave to come back another day after we's fixed the 'inges.

dialogue.name: TALK
dialogue.text: I will see that cargo now. Any vessel entering a port of Limsa Lominsa is bound by law to submit to a routine inspection.

dialogue.name: TALK
dialogue.text: The law, is it? Lads, I reckon it's time our “guests” 'ad 'emselves a little accident. Pitch 'em over the side!

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: A masterful display, Forename! Now we can finally gain access to their cargo.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: Oof!

dialogue.name: DOSWMAGA
dialogue.text: (-???-)What 'ave we 'ere, then? It's one o' the bitch Admiral's lapdogs, scamperin' about me ship.

dialogue.name: DOSWMAGA
dialogue.text: (-???-)Yer just like yer mistress: always stickin' yer nose in where it ain't invited.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: N-No...it can't be!

dialogue.name: DOSWMAGA
dialogue.text: (-???-)Hah. Recognized me pretty face, did ye?

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: B-But...you were caught... Exiled...

dialogue.name: AERSTHOTA
dialogue.text: Foreseer! Are you hurt? Can you stand?

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: St-Stay back! You stay away from me!

dialogue.name: AERSTHOTA
dialogue.text: Foreseer, please, calm down! What are your orders?

dialogue.name: DOSWMAGA
dialogue.text: (-???-)I've 'ad enough o' yer whimperin'. An' I've certainly 'ad enough o' these bloody books. It's clear ye ain't learnin' anythin' from 'em.

dialogue.name: DOSWMAGA
dialogue.text: (-???-)Reckon it's time ye got a different kind o' lesson!

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: Aaaaaah!

dialogue.name: AERSTHOTA
dialogue.text: K'lyhia! Nophica preserve us, she's fainted! We must withdraw!

dialogue.name: GEISSFRYN
dialogue.text: Forename, quickly! Back to the boat! We'll carry the foreseer!

dialogue.name: DOSWMAGA
dialogue.text: (-???-)Aye, that's right! Ye slink on back to yer mistress, ye worthless curs! Gahahahaha!

dialogue.name: AERSTHOTA
dialogue.text: We'll take care of K'lyhia. You'd best return to the Arcanists' Guild and report to Mistress Thubyrgeim.

dialogue.name: THUBYRGEIM
dialogue.text: It is good to see you well, Forename. Geissfryn sent word ahead of your travails. An unfortunate turn of events, but considering the infamous blackheart you faced, you might have fared much worse.

dialogue.name: THUBYRGEIM
dialogue.text: Have you heard of the pirate Doesmaga? He was exiled from Limsa Lominsa some years ago, but it appears he has chosen to defy the Admiral's orders.

dialogue.name: THUBYRGEIM
dialogue.text: And once more he dares lay a hand on Foreseer K'lyhia! The poor lass must have been terrified. If I had known Doesmaga was aboard that ship, I never would have assigned her that duty.

dialogue.name: THUBYRGEIM
dialogue.text: The assessor may require some time to recover─for K'lyhia, that man is a nightmare made flesh.

dialogue.name: THUBYRGEIM
dialogue.text: Though her physical wounds will soon mend, there is little we can do to salve the hurt to her mind. You are concerned? Angry, mayhap? Harness that energy, and channel it into your training. I predict we shall be needing your skills again before long.

dialogue.name: POP
dialogue.text: You sense a hostile presence!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Commence Stratagem Hardhead!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text:
Forename!
It's Topaz Carbuncle's time to shine!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Our healer must be protected first and foremost!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Too many. Just too many...

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: I must learn...to cure...my own wounds...

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: This scenario was not entirely unexpected...
